Posts.EditableText: Well, I placed 20th of 35 games on the ifcomp. My goal was to be in the first half, almost there. Last year I was in the last three games. No price this time. Here is my game: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... eam-pieces Congratulations to Alex for placing 15th with his game Moquette. He kinda stabbed me in the back with his own tool by choosing a different platform category but that's ok . He is probably right about web games placing better and he can choose a prize. So few prizes this year to choose, too bad for me. So long, M4u
Posts.HTML:
Well, I placed 20th of 35 games on the ifcomp. My goal was to be in the first half, almost there. Last year I was in the last three games. No price this time.

Here is my game:

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... eam-pieces

Congratulations to Alex for placing 15th with his game Moquette. He kinda stabbed me in the back with his own tool by choosing a different platform category but that's ok . He is probably right about web games placing better and he can choose a prize. So few prizes this year to choose, too bad for me.

So long,

M4u

Posts.EditableText: I submitted a game a couple of years ago, and it is a tough venue, so congratulations to both of you!
